framing: You are about to set out on an epic journey. You are are heading towards towards the distant country of Jyväsky, hoping to earn fame and fortune.
assets: You have some perfume, a ring, an ancient grimoire, and a spear, and you have skill: literacy, you have skill: storytelling, you have skill: fighting, and you have skill: sorcery.
set_off: Eager to be on your way, you set off on the road towards Jyväsky.
setup: You come across some bandits attacking a merchant.
potentials: The bandits are threatening the merchant.
opt1: You transform the bandits into a chicken (You have skill: sorcery. You have your ancient grimoire).
opt2: You attack the bandits (You have skill: fighting. They have skill: fighting. You have your spear. They have no tool for fighting).
opt3: You talk the bandits down (You have skill: storytelling).
out1: You cast a spell on the bandits, and the bandits are cursed with the form of a chicken.  The bandits are no longer threatening the merchant, they have been transformed into a chicken, and they are now unintelligent.
out2: You attack the bandits. They fight back but they are hit by your attack, and you strike at the bandits. They are defeated. You have acquired an ancient grimoire, the bandits are not threatening the merchant any more, and they are injured now.
out3: You reason with the bandits and the bandits agree to back off. The bandits are no longer threatening the merchant.

framing: You are about to set out on an epic journey. You are are heading towards towards the distant country of Velin, hoping to earn fame and fortune.
assets: You have a sack of gold, a ring, an ancient grimoire, and an oboe, and you have skill: literacy, you have skill: musician, you have skill: acrobatics, and you have skill: sorcery.
set_off: Eager to be on your way, you set off on the road towards Velin.
setup: As you journey onwards, an ogre approaches you slowly, stomping its feet.
opt1: You try to flee from the ogre (The ogre is missing skill: acrobatics. You have skill: acrobatics).
opt2: You attempt to pacify the ogre with music (You have skill: musician. You have your oboe).
opt3: You transform the ogre into a chicken (You have skill: sorcery. You have your ancient grimoire).
out1: You flee from the ogre and escape.  The ogre is not threatening you any more.
out2: You weave a soothing melody, and the ogre becomes calm. The ogre is not threatening you any more.
out3: You cast a spell on the ogre, and the ogre is cursed with the form of a chicken. The ogre is no longer threatening you, and she has been transformed into a chicken.

framing: You are about to set out on an epic journey. You are are heading towards towards the distant country of Cejavri, hoping to earn fame and fortune.
assets: You have some perfume, a ring, an ancient grimoire, and an oboe, and you have skill: literacy, you have skill: musician, you have skill: negotiation, and you have skill: sorcery.

setup: You come across some bandits attacking a merchant.
potentials: The bandits are threatening the merchant.
opt1: You talk the bandits down (You have skill: negotiation).
opt2: You offer the bandits your perfume (You have skill: negotiation).
opt3: You transform the bandits into a chicken (You have skill: sorcery. You have your ancient grimoire).
out1: You reason with the bandits and the bandits calm down.  The bandits are no longer threatening the merchant.
out2: You bargain with the bandits and reach a deal. You have lost your perfume, the bandits are no longer threatening the merchant, and they have acquired some perfume.
out3: You cast a spell on the bandits, and the bandits are cursed with the form of a chicken. The bandits are no longer threatening the merchant, they have been cursed and transformed into a chicken, and they have become unintelligent.
